questions: How to use the "Pause and Resume" plugin to wait for X seconds and then restart the workflow at a node in Tracardi?
What is the "Pause and Resume" plugin?
How to pause and resume a workflow in Tracardi?
answer:
# Can Tracardi wait for X seconds and then restart the workflow at this node?
Yes, Tracardi can wait for X seconds and then restart the workflow at this node using the "Pause and Resume" plugin
